biolockj.module.r

Class BuildOtuPlots

  • java.lang.Object
    • biolockj.module.BioModuleImpl
      • biolockj.module.ScriptModuleImpl
        • biolockj.module.r.R_Module
          • biolockj.module.r.BuildOtuPlots
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BioModule, ScriptModule

    public class BuildOtuPlots
extends R_Module
implements ScriptModule
    This BioModule is used to build the R script used to generate OTU-metadata box-plots and scatter-plots for each report field and taxonomy level.

    • Method Detail

      • buildAddBoxPlotFunction

        public String buildAddBoxPlotFunction()
                               throws Exception
        The method returns R code for the function addBoxPlot(otuTable, otuCol, metaCol, parPval, nonParPval ).
        The plot output compares OTU abundance with the metadata field factor levels (categories).

        R Function parameters:

        • otuTable = A data.frame returned by read.table( otuFilePath ) for a taxonomy-level OTU table
        • otuCol = OTU column number in otuTable
        • metaCol = Metadata column number in otuTable
        • parPval = Parametric P-value
        • nonParPval = Non-Parametric P-value

        Required Config properties: "r.pch", "r.colorPoint".

        BioLockJ R functions called by this method:

        • "getCexAxis"
        • "getColor"
        • "getFactorGroups"
        • "getLabels"
        • "getLas"
        • "getPlotTitle"
        Returns:
        R code
        Throws:
        Exception - if Config properties are missing or invalid

      • buildAddScatterPlotFunction

        public String buildAddScatterPlotFunction()
                                   throws Exception
        The method returns R code for the function addBoxPlot(otuTable, otuCol, metaCol, parPval, nonParPval).
        The plot output compares OTU abundance with the metadata field factor levels (categories).

        R Function parameters:

        • otuTable = A data.frame returned by read.table( otuFilePath ) for a taxonomy-level OTU table
        • otuCol = OTU column number in otuTable
        • metaCol = Metadata column number in otuTable
        • parPval = Parametric P-value
        • nonParPval = Non-Parametric P-value

        Required Config properties: "r.pch", "r.colorPoint".

        BioLockJ R functions called by this method:

        • "getColor"
        • "getFactorGroups"
        • "getLabels"

      • addPlots

        protected String addPlots(String cols,
                          String rFunctionSigniture)
                   throws Exception
        Method returns R code to loop through each column in cols and call the rFunctionSigniture. If top of new page, add OTU Name center top. Always increment the plot index.

        Dependent PlotUtil R function: addPlotLabel(label, size, color, las, side, rowIndex, colIndex)

        Parameters:
        cols - - List of metadata column names
        rFunctionSigniture - R code of plot function signature
        Returns:
        R code
        Throws:
        Exception - if Config properties are missing or invalid

      • plotGraphics

        protected String plotGraphics()
                       throws Exception
        This method is called once for each taxonomy level to build a taxonomy-level specific PDF report.
        For each level, add binary, nominal, and numeric plots.

        Dependent PlotUtil Java functions:

        • addBinaryBoxPlots()
        • addNominalBoxPlots()
        • addScatterPlots()
        Returns:
        String lines of R code
        Throws:
        Exception - if processing errors occur

      • rLinesInitPdf

        protected String rLinesInitPdf()
        Initialize the PDF report by generating the file name and par() function parameters to set the number of plots per page.
        Returns:
        rCode

      • rMainMethod

        protected String rMainMethod()
                      throws Exception
        The method returns R code for the function main(). For each taxonomy level - :
        1. Initialize a new PDF report
        2. Read the parametric adjusted p-value spreadsheet
        3. Read the non-parametric adjusted p-value spreadsheet
        4. For each reportable metadata field, add a box-plot or scatterplot based on the data type

        Dependent BioLockJ Java-R methods called in this method:

        • R_Module.forEachOtuLevel(String)
        • R_Module.enableDebug(String, String)
        • rLinesInitPdf()
        • R_Module.rLinesReadOtuTable()
        • R_Module.rLinesCreateAttColVectors()
        • R_Module.rLinesReadStatsTable(String, String)
        • R_Module.forEachOtu(String)
        • R_Module.filterRareOtus(String)
        • plotGraphics()
        Specified by:
        rMainMethod in class R_Module
        Returns:
        R code for the function main()
        Throws:
        Exception - if unable to build this required method
